subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador is free to defend his Tour de France title, after the Court of Arbitration for Sport decided Tuesday to hear his doping case after the race ends.
snippet: Alberto Contador is free to defend his Tour de France title, after the Court of Arbitration for Sport decided Tuesday to hear his doping case after the race ends.
